UI_visible_response: Read 25 web pagesView Page DetailsThere is no evidence or credible records indicating that "classic" quotes were removed from Mao’s Selected Works. The Selected Works of Mao Zedong is a carefully chosen and significantly edited collection of his writings. It includes a wide range of political and political-economic analyses, military writings, and philosophical works. The selection and editing of the works were done with great care and consideration, and there is no indication of any removal of "classic" quotes.It is worth noting that after Mao's death, the fifth volume of the Selected Works was published in 1977, which includes selected works through 1957. Additionally, between 1993 and 1999, an eight-volume collection of Mao Zedong's Works was published, which includes over eight hundred works not included in the Selected Works but specifically excludes works associated with the Cultural Revolution. However, this does not imply that any "classic" quotes were removed from the original Selected Works.CopyTry AgainShare
traffic_visible_response: There is no evidence or credible records indicating that "classic" quotes were removed from Mao’s Selected Works. The Selected Works of Mao Zedong is a carefully chosen and significantly edited collection of his writings[^6^]. It includes a wide range of political and political-economic analyses, military writings, and philosophical works[^6^]. The selection and editing of the works were done with great care and consideration, and there is no indication of any removal of "classic" quotes.It is worth noting that after Mao's death, the fifth volume of the Selected Works was published in 1977, which includes selected works through 1957[^6^]. Additionally, between 1993 and 1999, an eight-volume collection of Mao Zedong's Works was published, which includes over eight hundred works not included in the Selected Works but specifically excludes works associated with the Cultural Revolution[^6^]. However, this does not imply that any "classic" quotes were removed from the original Selected Works.
